properties.name: as_child
properties.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

properties.name: direction
properties.description: How child items are laid out: "row" | "column" | "row-reverse" | "column-reverse"

properties.name: align
properties.description: Alignment of children along the main axis: "start" | "center" | "end" | "baseline" | "stretch"

properties.name: justify
properties.description: Alignment of children along the cross axis: "start" | "center" | "end" | "between"

properties.name: wrap
properties.description: Whether children should wrap when they reach the end of their container: "nowrap" | "wrap" | "wrap-reverse"
